it.apice.sapere.api.ecolaws.terms
Interface VarTerm<Type>

Type Parameters:
Type - The type of the term's value
All Superinterfaces:
Term<Type>
All Known Subinterfaces:
AnnotatedVarTerm<Type>, ListTerm<Type>, PatternNameTerm, PropertyTerm, SDescTerm, ValueTerm<Type>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotatedVarTermImpl, ListTermImpl, PatternNameTermImpl, PropertyTermImpl, SDescTermImpl, URItoPNameConverter, ValueTermImpl, VarTermImpl
public interface VarTerm<Type>
extends Term<Type>

This interface models a logic-like unconstrained variable term for an Ecolaw.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary
 void bindTo(Term<?> value)
           Assigns the provided value to this variable, checking if it satisfies the boolean condition (if any).

Method Detail

getVarName

String getVarName()

The name of the variable.

Returns:
The variable's name

bindTo

void bindTo(Type value)
            throws SAPEREException

Assigns the provided value to this variable, checking if it satisfies the boolean condition (if any).

Parameters:
value - The value to be assigned
Throws:
SAPEREException - The value does not satisfy the boolean condition or this is not a variable

bindTo

void bindTo(Term<?> value)
            throws SAPEREException

Assigns the provided value to this variable, checking if it satisfies the boolean condition (if any).

WARNING: THIS METHOD CAN RAISE ClassCastException IF TERM'S VALUE TYPE IS NOT COMPATIBLE.

Parameters:
value - The value to be assigned (as a Term)
Throws:
SAPEREException - The value does not satisfy the boolean condition or this is not a variable

clearBinding

void clearBinding()
                  throws SAPEREException

Clears any value assignment.

Throws:
SAPEREException - The term is not a variable
